content: cable or scrap yarn stopping 2 stitches before m2 using backwards loop method c/o 12 underarm stitches k the front section to m3 remove marker k2 place sleeve stitches on an extra cable or scrap yarn stopping 2 stitches before m4 using backwards loop method c/o 12 underarm stitches k to the bor you should have about 65 stitches resting on your scrap yarn at this point depending on the depth of the yoke body- you should have about 196 stitches on the needles for the body at this point depending on how deep you knit your yoke 4 work in stockinette in the round until the work measures 20 from the base of the collar to the bottom switch to size 6mm and work one round of stockinette work 1x1 rib for 3 on the last round of ribbing and bind o cid 431 rounds only knit with the bulky/main color bind o cid 431 using the italian bind o cid 431 first working two rounds of double knitting sleeves- using your 6 5mm needle pick up the stitches that are resting on your scrap yarn or cable there should be about 65 stitches depending on the depth of your yoke then pick up the 12 stitches from the underarm cast on as well as 3 of the 4 stitches along the back where you knit the 4 extra row for a total of 15 picked up stitches be sure you have an even number of stitches place a bor marker in the middle of the underarm work decreases every 6th round while continuing to knit in stockinette decrease round- k2 k2tog k until 4 stitches before bor marker ssk k2 continue until you have knit 7 decrease rounds the sleeves should measure 9 from the underarm cast on at this point switch to 6mm needle knit one round in stockinette then work in rib for 3 on the last row of ribbing and bind o cid 431 rounds only knit with the bulky/main color yarn bind o cid 431 using the italian bind o cid 431 first working two row of double knitting weave in your ends and sew up any gaps in the arm pit block according to the dimensions listed at the beginning of the pattern thank you for knitting my pattern and please share your completed projects on ravelry 5
